title.rendered: Samsung Genuine Black GH98-41288A OTG Adapter USB Type-A To USB Type-C Connector For Galaxy S8 / S8 Plus & Other Type-C…

content.rendered:
Samsung EE-UN930BB USB Type-C / USB OTG Adapter Black This USB Type-C to USB OTG adapter is unique Samsung accent that permits an USB Type-C gadgets geared up with OTG operate (On-The-Go) to run as USB Host*. Charge and switch knowledge out of your storage gadgets and USB flash drive to your Type-C OTG gadget with none hassle. (NO RETAIL PACKAGING – BULK)

Make certain this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
This is the precise Samsung connector contained in the Samsung S8/S8 Plus field.

Connect USB-equipped gadgets to USB-C gadgets with consolation
Support for USB Type-A and USB Type-C, the info switch between your suitable smartphone and USB-supported storage media is kind of straightforward.
Use the adapter for charging or knowledge switch in case your gadget does not assist OTG operate (NO RETAIL PACKAGING)
